name: AVFNWINSAA
description:
WARNING!! PLEASE RENAME THE FOLDER "HorreurCaca_Data" as "AVFNWINSAA_Data", or else the game will not launch



This, is Steve, your new friendly neighbor.

You arrived in Averagetown to take a fresh start after you retired. Soon, your one and only friendly neighbor, who doesn't look weird at all, comes to introduce himself to you (tbh, he kinda looks like a serial killer).
